BotConfiguration.Token: some token need to be retrieved from BotFather
BotConfiguration.HostAddress: retrieved from start of ngrok for example https://ef42-48-15-16-23.ngrok.io
BotConfiguration.WebhookToken: This is secret token that you sent to Telegram. So only telegram can use your Webhook endpoint. It could be any random Guid
BotConfiguration.PaymentProviderToken: some token need to be retrieved from BotFather. For example 4815162342:TEST:g4815gg16g23424815g6234g481516g342481516

ConnectionStrings.Test: this field might be left empty it needed for check is configuration loaded from environment
